title.narrative: Bangladesh: Rural Electricity Transmission and Distribution Project

description.narrative: The proposed Project development objectives are to reduce system losses and enhance capacity in the rural distribution network of primarily the eastern part of Bangladesh.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :BREB's Project Management Unit | Description :BREB to establish and maintain a Project Management Unit withdedicated staff for implementation of Parts A and C.1 of the Project. | Due Date :01-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :ESMF and GAAP | Description :BREB and PGCB shall ensure that their respective parts of the Project are carriedout in accordance with the provisions of the Environment and Social Management Framework (EMSF) and the Governance andAccountability Action Plan (GAAP) including full payment of any compensation to Affected Persons (or provision of resettlementassistance) prior to their involuntary displacement . | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :PGCB's Project Management Unit | Description :PGCB to establish and maintain a Project Management Unit withdedicated staff for implementation of Parts B and C.2 of the Project. | Due Date :01-Jun-2014
